data.title: Admin Dashboard

page.title: Admin Dashboard
page.description: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your store.

modules.employees_description: Manage staff, departments, roles, and performance

data.title: Inventory Management
data.description: Manage your products, brands, categories, and stock levels

form_placeholders.name: Enter name...

messages.error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
messages.error_duplicate: An item with this name already exists

messages.error_delete_has_children: Cannot delete: this category has subcategories
messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

tooltips.export: Export data to CSV or Excel
